results.title: To reauthorize the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation program.
results.short_title: To reauthorize the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation program.
results.committees: Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee
results.latest_major_action: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.) (Sec. 1) This bill amends the Omnibus Parks and Public Lands Management Act of 1996 to reauthorize for FY2018-FY2024 the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation Fund Grant Program.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.) (Sec. 1) This bill amends the Omnibus Parks and Public Lands Management Act of 1996 to reauthorize for FY2018-FY2024 the Historically Black Colleges and Universities Historic Preservation Fund Grant Program.

actions.description: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote. (text: CR H5207)
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1135.
Considered under suspension of the rules. (consideration: CR H5207-5210)
Mr. Cook moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 104.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-157.
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
